command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/7/3/dataset_c73b5c95-fe61-4e0d-8374-aff86bd13f8d.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view     --samples 'NA00002'     --min-ac 1 --max-ac 1 --types "snps"            --regions-overlap 1          --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/d/c/6/dataset_dc6925f0-f428-4a43-9480-b5c9ef9b292b.dat'
